Description: 2012 EVH Wolfgang USA Archtop electric guitar. Fantastic guitar in near mint condition (has one tiny chip in the headstock binding (see photo)). Comes with EVH hardshell case and all paperwork/case candy. *Shipping to the continental USA is FREE via FedEx Ground, International shipping is $150 via USPS Priority. *Seller is not responsible for any duty/tax imposed by foreign customs. These fees vary based on country, product, and price. Please contact your local customs facility for more information. Thanks for looking! An instrument that is the result of a lifetime obsession for perfection. An instrument that is the result of a lifetime obsession for perfection.The EVH Wolfgang guitar is the result of two years of painstaking research and development, and a year of intense road testing. With every minute detail upgraded to the highest standards, the EVH Wolfgang has been built to Eddie's precise specifications, and has features exactly like the Wolfgang guitars he records and performs with. The EVH Wolfgang is constructed with a distinctive double-cutaway body comprised of an arched AA maple top on a lightweight basswood back, a quartersawn single-piece AA bird's-eye maple neck loaded with stainless steel frets, custom-wound double-potted guitar pickups, five-piece binding on the matching body and headstock, custom-made signature tuning machines, Floyd Rose double-locking tremolo with the patented EVH D-Tuna drop-D tuning system, and Bourns low-friction pots. Another innovative Eddie-designed modification is the reverse-wired 3-way pickup toggle switch: the up position (normally the neck pickup) is the bridge pickup, down (normally the bridge) is the neck pickup. Use the drop-down menu above to choose colors and other options. FEATURES 1-1/2" basswood back 1-2" arched AA maple top Bolt-on quartersawn maple neck AA bird's-eye maple fingerboard 25-1/2"-scale length Compound fingerboard radius 12"-16" 22 vintage-size stainless steel frets Floyd Rose R2 locking nut 1-5/8" nut width Chrome hardware EVH-branded Gotoh tuners, chrome with pearloid buttons EVH-branded Floyd Rose locking tremolo EVH humbuckers (neck and bridge) 3-way pickup toggle (reverse wired) Master Volume and Tone Controls 2 Bourns low-friction pots 250k/500k SKB case with molded stripes Unique features: Hard mount pickups Magna Coatings paint 2 graphite neck reinforcement rods Schaller chrome string retainer EVH D-Tuna Square jack plate
